text: Étinehem-Méricourt is a commune in the department of Somme, northern France. The municipality was established on 1 January 2017 by a merger of the former communes of Étinehem (the seat) and Méricourt-sur-Somme.Arrêté préfectoral 11 July 2016 == See also == *Communes of the Somme department == References == Category:Communes of Somme (department) Category:Populated places established in 2017
title: Étinehem-Méricourt
